text: Hey team, looking to work with Sage Reed for Coles. Budget is approx $19,272 - need 1 x Instagram story, 1 x 90-second product demo, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Media interview, 2 x Brand ambassador content. 4 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 8 months. Start date: November 2025.
